channel.title: Brindlewood Bay is here!
channel.description:
Brindlewood Bay is now available in The Gauntlet's $6+ Patreon feed!
Brindlewood Bay is a Powered by the Apocalypse game that combines cozy murder mystery stories with Lovecraftian horror. It's Murder, She Wrote meets The Shadow Over Innsmouth. We think you're going to love it.
Everything you need is available in the feed:
Brindlewood Bay Rules Brindlewood Bay Rules (booklet printing) Character Sheet Reference Sheet Maven Moves Sheet Dark Conspiracy Sheet Mysteries (5): * Dad Overboard * All Hallows Scream * The GBBBO (The Great Brindlewood Bay Bake-Off) * Jingle Bell Shock * A Murder Most Mucky
Get it by pledging $6+ here: patreon.com/gauntlet
![Screen Shot 2020-01-29 at 10.41.22 AM|323x500](upload://qA0cXmz7asCkrw28BAh6n44P62s.jpeg)

item.title: Brindlewood Bay is here!

item.description:
@jasoncordova wrote:

Brindlewood Bay is now available in The Gauntlet’s $6+ Patreon feed!

Brindlewood Bay is a Powered by the Apocalypse game that combines cozy murder mystery stories with Lovecraftian horror. It’s Murder, She Wrote meets The Shadow Over Innsmouth. We think you’re going to love it.
